content.label:
Found all the secrets relatively fast, but still greatly hidden. This game is mind boggling! The shifts and turns just are awesome! Great idea for an app, all my games I‚Äôve made are not as cleverly designed as this one, it‚Äôs just amazing! Great job team and keep up the good work! 
P.S. I am going to play the alpha version on the computer as son as possible! I loved the app!
This game is a very addicting puzzle turner and it‚Äôs unique in its own way I‚Äôve never been hooked on an iPhone game unlike this I would recommend to everyone I find :)
Will there ever be anymore of the game?
Great time

title.label: Takes a little to get it, but worth it.

content.label: I‚Äôm having fun with this game! I had to go back and look at what i was doing but i got the goal in the end. Great job!
A very pretty little puzzle box. Sounds great too!
Mobile Interactive Minimal Audio Visual Experience üòç if you like any of those things, play play play. Skeleton Corps! Make more!
I highly recommend this game! I had so much fun unraveling the puzzles and was very happy with the difficulty level. It was challenging but not so much that I had to get help from walkthroughs.
Wooooh

I really love this, it challenges the brain and it forces you to look into the future and catalog of possibilities to find out where to go. Is it wrong or creepy though that I know exactly what music program was used to make the soundtrack? üòÖ
My only complaint about this game is that I finished it too quickly.
It looks simple and boring but it actually draws u in once u start playing! Every little detail makes this game unique and full of surprises.
yeos

It's not clear how to play this game and you don't really do much more then pressing buttons to see if something happens. The design is beautiful but the concept of having fun is far from becoming real in this game.
I feel like it's rare to find creative unique puzzlers these day.
I'm speechless
This game is astonishing!!!
Had a great time playing this stylish puzzle game. Not as easy as it seems.

A gorgeous app that is really a work of art. Sound, color, and interactivity are all done to perfection. 

My only complaint is that the app crashes every time I go from the goblet back to the hour glass. Not sure if this is only on my phone.

Edit: the above was fixed and I was able to complete the game. It's absolutely wonderful. I've not played any other game quite like this one.
It's interesting to play. Trying to figure out what items you can get from other items and little tricks that will help you!!
It is a game of discovery. It's mysterious and weird. I like it!

title.label: Great game but not great value

content.label: I really loved this game and thought it was a great little toy to mess around with, I even 100% completed it. I don't think the price is worth how short of a game I received though. I'd still recommend it but I would warn anyone that it's very short.

title.label: Really fun, but needs a tiny bit more guidance

content.label: I think this game has lots of promise, and is really fun. I just wish there was a little bit of a better catalogue of where you've been, and also I wish there was a more cohesive explanation of how things work. And if there is some ultimate goal or if it's just discovering objects ad infinitum.
Very well made, trippy and entertaining game :)
This game is not just a game, it is a work of art. This game needs to be more noticed!

The game is engrossing as you get lost shifting around the items, although I will say that as you get accustomed to the gameplay it becomes easier to navigate. However there is a major glitch with the camera - after taking a picture the app becomes nonresponsive and requires rebooting. It's a fairly irritating glitch.

EDIT: so it's still glitching for me after the mid-May fix, it's the selfie version that gets stuck

EDIT 2: The meadow/woods are fixed for me, but still stuck on mountains for some reason.
When you transform an object into another it's really cool
This game is so amazing and very trippy.

A satisfying puzzle that keeps managing to surprise me!
Honestly, though, words don't do it justice. Playing this game feels really good (haven't felt this way with a puzzler in a long time). 

Thanks so much for making it (and try it out if you haven't)! ‚ù§Ô∏è
I have no complaints. Such a wonderfully trippy experience. Worth the buy.
B
Meditative and addicting. My only complaint is that it's not longer. I played the whole thing in a day and was left wanting more. Vignettes 2, please!

title.label: Keeps a brain like mine occupied

content.label: Delightful puzzle with so many possibilities
This is the best mobile game I've played by far. Really beautiful graphics, seamless tutorial-free gameplay, relaxing music. I only wish it were longer! A must play even if you're not a mobile gamer.
There's more here than meets the eye !

title.label: Most satisfying puzzle game that happens to have awesome creative art direction

content.label: Rarely am I really impressed with well conceived and executed a game is. This easily could have just been a neat art game which honestly I thought it was, until I started discovering all the puzzles within . So so so satisfying to finish... and you get a secret gift from the developers too ;) so much fun!!

The concept is amazing, and you do not bombard the player with written instructions, which can sometimes get monotonous. The color schemes each work great together but can also stand alone beautifully. It's been a while since I have enjoyed an app this much. Thank you for making this.
Incredibly fun game
Vignettes is a well-designed artistic puzzler with easy controls and little surprises blended in everywhere.
You play by rotating images and playing with perspective and form to create new images which then lead to further new experiences. It's entertaining and relaxing to see the game/puzzle progress.
Love to explore the items and find the little interactions!
From color pallet, graphics, and sound design to the elegant, calming gameplay this app delivers on every penny.
This game is beautiful and well done. I love the simple idea, and the fact that it's still complex in the way it's executed makes it even better.
I don't even like games, but this one has my attention. Always something new to discover!
Beautiful and satisfying

title.label: Glitches in same place every time

content.label: This game is too short but OK. Yet every single time I flip the chalice to the crown, the screen freezes and the game shuts down. It's not my phone. I'm very aware of available memory and  I keep one game at a time loaded on my 6s. If I can get 100 percent through Star Wars Lego the complete version without my phone screwing up I should be able to get through a piddly $2.99 time waster. Wasted $$.

It's like there is a world on my back and when I turn around it escapes my grasp and runs away but then stops dead in it's tracks and stands  their as if mocking me but until I finally understand it I can reach and achieve it

title.label: Beautiful, but if you're smarter than the average it's going to be easy...

content.label: As an avid gamer I weigh the price of a game to the time spent playing it. I should get a dollar per hour in ideal circumstances and replayability makes that an even more relevant variable.... as of typing this review, I've found all but two of the main items, albeit only four of the secrets and I've only been playing for about an hour. As it stands, I don't see where they might put any replay value into it, as when you know what sequence to traverse the items it becomes memory to swipe and flip and tap without much thought. It's a beautiful game, and it's clever and very engaging... at first... but after that initial hour it just left me wanting more. The sound design is key because it cues you into which item you just flipped to because each item has its own unique sound. Good game, but if you're good at puzzles and clever in general it might be too short for you.
I have really enjoyed playing Vignettes.  It is relaxing, yet challenging.
Very fun
